mapper.select: SELECT a.*, CASE WHEN @partition_by = a.result_id THEN @rownum := @rownum + 1 ELSE @rownum :=1 END AS frequ, @partition_by := result_id AS partition_by FROM (SELECT ma.*, mi.item_name, mi.if_enter FROM m_norm_fee ma LEFT JOIN m_fee_item mi ON ma.item_no=mi.item_no WHERE ma.occ_month=#{occMonth} AND ma.ass_type='m.assType.4' AND ma.team_no=#{teamNo}) a INNER JOIN (SELECT @rownum :=0) r ON 1=1 INNER JOIN (SELECT @partition_by :='') p ON 1=1 ORDER BY a.result_id
SELECT up_item, SUM(norm_bala) norm_bala FROM m_norm_fee WHERE occ_month=#{occMonth} AND ass_type=#{assType} AND team_no=#{teamNo} AND IFNULL(up_item,'')!='' GROUP BY up_item

SELECT mn.*, ma.occ_bala, ma.diff_bala, ma.diff_scale, mi.item_name, mi.out_type, (SELECT text FROM sys_organization WHERE id=mn.team_no) team_name FROM m_norm_fee mn LEFT JOIN m_assess ma ON mn.assess_id = ma.assess_id LEFT JOIN m_fee_item mi ON mn.item_no=mi.item_no WHERE mn.occ_month=#{occMonth} AND mn.ass_type=#{assType} AND mi.if_enter!=#{ifEnter} ORDER BY mn.team_no, mn.prj_no

SELECT mn.*, mi.item_name, CASE WHEN @partition_by = mn.result_id THEN @rownum := @rownum + 1 ELSE @rownum :=1 END AS frequ, @partition_by := result_id AS partition_by, (SELECT text FROM sys_organization WHERE id=mn.team_no) team_name FROM m_norm_fee mn LEFT JOIN m_fee_item mi ON mn.item_no=mi.item_no INNER JOIN (SELECT @rownum :=0) r ON 1=1 INNER JOIN (SELECT @partition_by :='') p ON 1=1 WHERE occ_month=#{occMonth} AND ass_type=#{assType} AND mi.item_name LIKE '%支护材料%' ORDER BY mn.team_no, mn.result_id

SELECT mn.team_no, CASE WHEN mn.up_item='' THEN mi.item_name ELSE td.text END item_name, mn.ass_price, mi.item_unit, mn.result_id, (SELECT text FROM sys_organization WHERE id=mn.team_no) team_name FROM m_norm_fee mn LEFT JOIN m_fee_item mi ON mn.item_no=mi.item_no LEFT JOIN sys_dic_item td ON mn.up_item=td.value WHERE mn.occ_month=#{occMonth} AND mn.ass_type=#{assType} AND mi.if_enter='1' AND mn.team_no IN (58, 59, 60) GROUP BY mn.team_no, CASE WHEN mn.up_item='' THEN mi.item_name ELSE td.text END, mn.ass_price, mi.item_unit, mn.result_id ORDER BY mn.team_no

SELECT mi.team_no, mi.item_no, IFNULL(mb.bud_bala, 0) norm_bala, IFNULL(mo.occ_bala, 0) norm_amount, (SELECT item_name FROM m_item WHERE item_no=mi.item_no) item_name, (SELECT text FROM sys_organization WHERE id=mi.team_no) team_name FROM (SELECT b.team_no,a.item_no FROM m_prj_item a, m_prj b WHERE a.prj_no=b.prj_no AND EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM m_item WHERE item_no=a.item_no AND item_use='m.itemUse.3') GROUP BY b.team_no,a.item_no) mi LEFT JOIN m_budget mb ON mi.item_no=mb.item_no AND mb.team_no=mi.team_no AND mb.occ_month=#{occMonth} LEFT JOIN (SELECT team_no, item_no, SUM(out_amount*mat_price) occ_bala FROM m_out WHERE out_date >= #{beginDate} AND out_date <=#{endDate} AND draw_step='7202F' AND data_src='m.dataSrc.3' GROUP BY team_no,item_no) mo ON mo.team_no=mi.team_no AND mo.item_no=mi.item_no
